room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: This was a lot of fun! We did the Kidnapping - you are blindfolded and handcuffed to start. It wasn't scary though. Very fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We went and did the kidnapped room with family who were in from out of town. We made it out with 3 minutes to spare. When we arrived, I wasn't sure what to make of the place. We sat in the waiting room for a few minutes when Joe, the manager, came out and introduced himself. He was so full of enthusiasm and was very friendly the whole time. The experience would have been good if it were just the room, but Joe made the experience into a great one! We needed a few hints and he helped us along the way. It was such a fun time. 5/5 for sure and I'll definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We did the kidnapped room, it was definitely hard but our host Nick was great! He knew when and how to say stuff without making it too easy, just to make our brain wheels turn. We will definitely be back to do other rooms in the future. They are a little more pricey but it's worth it to be guaranteed for a private room. Tons of fun ! Thank you! This was our 9th escape room total, and we had one person doing their first room with us

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: I was there last night to participate in The Kidnapping. It was so much fun! It was the perfect balance of challenge and teamwork. I would go back in a heartbeat to participate in another Breakout challenge.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: In my group there was 6 of us and it was all of our first escape room. We chose the 'Kidnapping' room and it was exciting yet challenging. Staff was helpful and friendly! Highly recommend!
